content: What a wonderful set of practices and exercises! I think I'll start with the Impermanence Meditation and Reflection on the Five Reminders. I'm curious to see how these practices will help me understand impermanence better and appreciate the present moment. I'll also try to incorporate impermanence into my daily routine, maybe by setting a reminder on my phone to reflect on it each day. Do you have any suggestions on how I can journal about my experiences and insights after these meditations and reflections?
